name: IoT-based Gas Pipe Leakage Detector
desc: IoT-enabled BOT for real-time gas leakage detection. Integrated MQ-9 sensors with Arduino UNO and ESP8266, connected to InfluxDB & Grafana dashboards, and implemented SMS alerts via GSM module.

name: Intelligent Embedded Robot Using Ultrasonic and IR Sensors
desc: Autonomous robot using ultrasonic and IR sensors for real-time obstacle detection and navigation. Developed in C (Arduino IDE) with optimized detection thresholds improving accuracy by 25%.

name: Custom Cloud Dashboard
desc: IoT cloud dashboard integrating Grafana API for real-time sensor monitoring, automated reporting, and Power BI dashboards for decision-making. Improved IoT device management efficiency by 20%.

name: Predictive Analytics Platform for Match Outcome Simulation
desc: Data analytics platform for simulating and predicting match outcomes using historical datasets. Applied predictive modeling with Pandas & Matplotlib, automated data fetching via APIs, and enabled ML readiness.
